    • queryReceiveRedEnvelopeByCondition

      public QueryResult<ReceiveRedEnvelope> queryReceiveRedEnvelopeByCondition(GiveRedEnvelope giveRedEnvelope, boolean includeNotReceive, int firstIndex, int maxResult, boolean sort, boolean isCancelAccountInfo)
      按条件查询收红包分页
      参数:
      giveRedEnvelope - 发红包
      includeNotReceive - 是否包含未领取红包(仅20.公共随机红包(随机金额))
      firstIndex - 索引开始,即从哪条记录开始
      maxResult - 获取多少条数据
      sort - 排序 true:正序 false:倒序
      isCancelAccountInfo - 是否显示注销用户信息
